flawed_nl_solution:
Bea's sales amount to $0.25/glass x 10 glasses = 250 cents.
Dawn's sales amount to $0.28/glass x 8 glasses = 190.78 cents.
So, Bea earned $2.5 - $1.91 = 59.22 cents more than Dawn.
